title: Executive Order 5246-To Permit Approval of an Application for Right of Way for a Gas Pipe Line Within Power Site Reserve No. 377, Utah
content: Upon recommendation of the Secretary of the Interior, Executive order of July 1, 1913, creating Power Site Reserve No. 377, in Utah, is hereby modified to the extent of authorizing him to approve an application filed by the Uinta Pipe Line Company, pursuant to the provisions of the act of Congress approved February 25, 1920 (41 Stat. 437), for right of way for a pipe line to convey gas crossing certain lands within said reserve.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5246-To Permit Approval of an Application for Right of Way for a Gas Pipe Line Within Power Site Reserve No. 377, Utah Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360939
